lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: There is more than one way to help others and this one rocks.

lender.name: Van
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do. We must leave the world a better place for humanities sake.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: Because of Phillip, Liza and Dane.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: I am able to. I feel that it is the responsibility of everyone to assist those that they are able to. While the loans here are not titanic, they make a very large difference in the lives of these people, and that is a wonderful thing.

lender.name: Ted B.
lender.loan_because: I want to help the working poor in the world.
lender.occupational_info: In my work I use a computer to create designs, and I take photos.

lender.name: Dionne
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I develop media strategies to increase the visibility of my organization in the press and to influence policy in state and national governments around the world.

lender.name: Christian Berger
lender.loan_because: Small credits instead of common unconditional aid seem quite reasonable to me, are they?

lender.name: Zus&Jet
lender.loan_because: We were once given a chance to build on our future.Now we honour the man who gave us this chance by helping others
lender.occupational_info: We own an old-fashioned museumshop that tells about days long gone

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: To give access to credit to the people traditional banks would refuse to serve.
lender.occupational_info: Consultancy Renewable E

lender.name: Josue
lender.loan_because: I understand that the key to economic development doesn't grow with just 'aid'. But people within their community need buy and sell. Credit, capital has to be provided to help a business expand and grow. That's why I proud to loan, because my money to put to work helping people achieve their buisness potentials.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I love to help people

lender.name: Ajay
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in lives of entrepreneurs who are taking on quite a bit of risk to establish or expand their businesses.

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: It's nice to do something nice
lender.occupational_info: I'd rather not...

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I won the cosmic lottery being alive in the US at this time and with the family and skills I have and would like to share my good fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: I just got a full time job in product development and hope to add a new $25 loan with each paycheck (weekly) til I have a bunch of money kicking around here at which time I'll let it roll itself back over continuously to other loans.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I help raise funds for small, community nonprofit organizations.

lender.name: Brittany
lender.loan_because: I'm a humanist.
lender.occupational_info: I garden local varieties of vegetables and also study literature.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I know how hard running a business can be.
lender.occupational_info: People pay me money to take photographs

lender.name: steve
lender.occupational_info:
I like to work hard and play hard,living by the sea and Dartmoor let's me do this, I am running a business selling adult lingerie and toy's.go to the site and check it out. It might not be for everyone but pass it on to others it WILL be appreciated. There is also a "buy it now" auction site I use,
http://www.cqout.com/list.asp?seller=chalkie101
There are over 900 items to choose from so there should be something for everyone. This is my favourite place, from order to delivery was only 4 day’s can’t get better.
http://www.cocoadultfun.co.uk
Happy shopping
Steve

lender.name: Rochelle
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Market research, graphic design and sales

lender.name: Luca
lender.loan_because: My little help can be very important to someone in the world

lender.name: Carrie & Christian
lender.loan_because: my ship has brought thousands of tons of grain to people in need and I am told that a large portion of it gets stolen or misused. I feel this program will allow our donations to be more effective.
lender.occupational_info: I am a kindergarten teacher and Christian works on ships.

lender.name: b_boy
lender.loan_because: i want people to have the same opportunities available to me

lender.name: Social Justice Team
lender.loan_because: We must use the gifts and talents we have been given to stand in solidarity with those on the margins of society.
lender.occupational_info: The Social Justice Team seeks to discover, explore and embody our Christian call to radical, Christ-like love. We are rooted in the Scripture and our rich tradition of Catholic Social Teachings. We connect what we experience at Mass to how we live by serving the common good through works of mercy for the poor and vulnerable as well as working to eliminate the conditions that create the need for charity by advocating for just social policy and education of ourselves and the community.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I am blessed enough to be able to now
lender.occupational_info: I teach 6 -7 year olds math, literacy, science, and social studies

lender.name: Ellis
lender.loan_because: if not me, who?
lender.occupational_info: I take photographs to document a moment in time.

lender.name: Judi
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become self-sufficient and be able to provide for their families. I love Jesus, and this is a way I can show His love to others.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to support the many men and women who see beyond the hard times and try to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I make computers, machines and other technologies easier to use for everyday people.

lender.name: Marie
lender.occupational_info: I turn entrepreneurs Rich, Happy & Hot w/a bad-ass combo of irresistible marketing, blow-your-mind spiritual transformation & easy ways to make a lot more money doing what you love.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because:
Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It's not. ~Dr. Seuss
Nobody can do everything, but everyone can do something. ~Author Unknown

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Giving to others is the greatest gift of our lives. We receive so much more from giving than receiving.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom of two boys.

lender.name: Hoja
lender.loan_because: I feel so connected to the world because when one goes through hardship, we all do. And if my small income and wealth can be shared and made useful to others. Particularly ones that share in turn with their communities... It makes me happier than anything else in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I read books and pass tests! Hopefully it will lead to something bigger! I am studying Journalism and hope to write and speak about Kiva to others.

lender.name: Erikus
lender.loan_because: We most built a socially-environmentally and economically sustainable society.
lender.occupational_info: Consultant

lender.name: Dave & Amy
lender.loan_because: We loan because of my Uncle Pete

lender.name: MaryK
lender.loan_because: I invest in ways that I determine is a good risk and is also Fun. Kiva does that for me! I know everyone I invested in is capable of reaching their goal, and even go beyond that!
lender.occupational_info: I am happiest when my life is filled with diversity. So, it is natural (and normal) for me to work in health care AND be a writer of self help and motivational articles. I also have a website and publish a monthly newsletter.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to improve their lives

lender.name: Shoeb
lender.loan_because: I would hope someone would help me in my time of need.
lender.occupational_info: Third year medical school student.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Churchill
lender.loan_because: People everywhere deserve the opportunity to reach their dreams.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by reading about Grameen Bank in Bangladesh.
lender.occupational_info: Fighting for civil rights inside Arizona and working to help others outside my country.

lender.name: Jilian
lender.loan_because: I know that the people using these loans really appreciate the money they receive, and it's nice to be a part of that process.

lender.name: Channing
lender.loan_because: I may not have the most, but I sure don't have the least, and I don't want to take my opportunity to give for granted. Christ calls me to more.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Micro loans allow people an opportunity to realize their dreams of being an entrepreneur in a manner that preserves their dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a connector and communicator.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to. I've received enough kindness in my 29 years of life from others. It's time I start giving some of it back.

lender.name: bcmegan
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish and he will eat for a day. Teach him how to fish and he will eat for a lifetime." Chinese Proverb
lender.occupational_info: Retired administrator

lender.name: CHOBI
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: Fashion

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want others to experience the joys of financial well-being and to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I engineer telecommunication networks.

lender.name: Erickson Family
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my kids the importance of giving to help others, and that there are people in the world who live differently than us in the western world. We make a loan twice a month, and the kids choose the entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: I help people invest their savings to provide for future needs. I believe Kiva is a way to invest socially, with valuable social returns.

lender.name: Diz
lender.loan_because: I am privileged to have so much more than many others in the world
lender.occupational_info: I retired from working on a ferry that carried people and cars between towns here in Alaska

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference to people's lives.

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because: I think that microcredit can enable small entrepreneurs to live their dream and to have the chance of leading a better life!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student in a French business school, and I am currently working in the gas industry, more precisely in marketing for the Welding and Cutting segment.

lender.name: Mia
lender.loan_because: I want to run a selling perfumes business but now I don't have anything with me to start.I hope from this site I can get the loan for me to as my capital.I need $15500 for starting.
lender.occupational_info: I will open a kiosk in KLCC. I choose the place because it's one of the busiest place in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.occupation: Work for the Town of Frisco
lender.loan_because: With just a little money, I can help someone else with their business and change their lives for the better!
lender.occupational_info: During a typical day I repair and maintain the streets within the town, whether it be plowing snow during the winter or patching the road, replacing signs and cleaning the streets in the summer.

lender.name: nick
lender.loan_because: i am a beast
lender.occupational_info: cause i feel good for people who have good ideas

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I am tall and I need my rep up because i stomp on too many people
lender.occupational_info: Hard to see people, easy to squish, though

lender.name: Stinsons Students
lender.loan_because: My students are actually the ones raising the money for this loan!
lender.occupational_info: I am a social studies high school teacher who strives to reveal to my students the excitement and satisfaction of making connections with people of other cultures throughout the world!

lender.name: Rob Packer
lender.loan_because: We can

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: I know how it feels
lender.occupational_info: My job is all about giving a good meal experience for my clients and to make money from it

lender.name: Britt
lender.loan_because: My students and I wanted to make a change.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: My sister found this wonderful organisation and I love the idea so much. It seems a powerful way to enrich others while enriching ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: Listening to doctors reports and typing them into legible format. Helping students to learn this work.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: If I have the means to help anyone I will try my best. Everyone should have some kind of opportunity to be successful in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I work very hard as a caterer to make sure my customers are satisfied in everyway.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because:
The loans I give here are in memory of my late husband Bob Raymer, who died in November 2008 of Alzheimer's Disease. He was deeply loved by so many people because his main purpose in life was to be of service to others. I can't think of a better way to honor his memory than to help others help themselves.
Also, giving to others is a wonderful way for me to "give back" to everyone who has helped me, whether financially or in other ways, through the years.
It's such a small world, we have to help one another. One life lifted lifts all lives.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired, which means I am no longer in the workforce; however, I keep busy with my writing and photography hobbies along with keeping in touch with my family and friends.

lender.name: J-Florin
lender.loan_because: i like helping people

lender.name: prashant
lender.loan_because: I think en-powering people is the best way of service we can do as individuals.

lender.name: Hanny en Rob
lender.loan_because: Lots of friends gave us credit to do so for our wedding anniversary!

lender.name: simon
lender.loan_because: through loaning, i make it possible for somebody to overcome a financial hurdle that would have otherwise impeded their progression in whatever endeavour they set out to do
lender.occupational_info: I am a small scale businessman dealing in general supplies to both governmental and non governmental organisations

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies tell their stories better.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I think networks and one to one contact are very powerful so if enough people get involved with this and invite all their friends and contacts this could really make a difference. Plus if you help just one person it's got to be worth it. These people generally have the kind of attitude that offers the developing world its best chance to improve health and quality of life for all who are not as fortunate as many of us in the developed world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a financial planner, I advise people on how to plan their personal finances to meet their long term goals in life from retiring in comfort to protecting their partner in case something happens to them to helping their children get a good education.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people sell their house themselves.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: each of us needs to give to others
lender.occupational_info: I record the business transactions for my firms

lender.name: J.A.D.E.
lender.loan_because: We are a home schooling family and use Kiva to make a difference in the world and to teach our children the importance of helping others.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family that schools at home.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I believe that the entrepreneurial spirit is alive in all people. Expanding the opportunity for others to live self-directed and empowered lives is a mission of mine. Peer to peer lending, and the micro-finance systems behind it, will help millions of people improve their lives and provide opportunities for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a successful entrepreneur who would like to teach others how they can improve their businesses while creating a better world. I am available to be a mentor to those who are dedicated to skills building and are open to coaching. I passionately believe we live in an abundant world and it is our job to harness it safely and form global communities to share ideas and be a part of a new civilization; one that respects all forms of life and preserves our very existence as a species.

lender.name: Humberto Ferreira
lender.loan_because: I feel that we all live in the same planet and share the same fate
lender.occupational_info: I try to spread fun and knowledge around...so I project and develop games for mobile platforms

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can and I am grateful for what I have
lender.occupational_info: I help publish books about technology, especially about the internet and these help people understand how it can be used and made better.

lender.name: Joe
lender.occupational_info: Student Medicine Economics

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I feel strongly that we who have to give, should.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a partnership with a wonderful couple who have gifts that they are willing to share with new entrepreneurs around the globe and I am thankful that I am along for the journey.

lender.name: Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance. I am thankful I had mine.
lender.occupational_info: I investigate what is altered in the brain of patients who suffer from mental illness, specially schizophrenia.

lender.name: Jennifer & Luke
lender.loan_because: We have been given much by God and we want to share it.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: because I can help.
lender.occupational_info: project management

lender.name: Candace
lender.loan_because: I want my daughters to understand that even doing something small, such as loaning money or making a donation, can have a huge impact on other people's lives.

lender.name: Chelcea
lender.loan_because: 'cause Mr. when you're rattling on heaven's gate. By then it is too late. 'cause Mr. when you get there, They don't ask what you saved. All they'll want to know Mr. is what you gave. Ben Harper

lender.name: Kit and Liz
lender.loan_because: We are a fortunate couple wanting to give to people who are working to make better lives for themselves rather than waiting for bailouts or having a sense of entitlement. Microfinance is an amazing process, and these people want to create their own luck - we want to help!!!
lender.occupational_info: Kit sells wood flooring, while Liz is an oncology nurse.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: A little bit can do a lot
lender.occupational_info: I'm a glass artist who creates fused glass tile, dishes, home decor and jewelry.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to better my children future
lender.occupational_info: It is very important to my life

lender.name: Julene
lender.loan_because: I want to increase hope in the world.

lender.name: Brendan Pickering
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to loan to me if I needed help!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and entrepreneur.

lender.name: Lewis
lender.occupation: I work in a grocery store
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in people's lives

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: Because kiva makes it more personal and i like that I see what my donation is doing and who it is helping. Plus the money gets returned to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Photoshop in motion

lender.name: Iakona College
lender.occupational_info: We are medical students at UC Davis School of Medicine in Sacramento, CA

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I don't know how to invest my money in this economy... so why not put it where it'll do some good?
lender.occupational_info: I do several things to make the world better, especially working on biochar.

lender.name: Alysia
lender.loan_because: My heart loves to dance!
lender.occupational_info:
I work with mixed media, and stone. I create small scale (jewelry) and larger scale sculpture works in metal as well as modeling compounds and I paint. My ability to work is limited , so I love to encourage others to continually expand their abilities as I do!
~I also love to dance! ~

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to live in a place and at a time when I am able to be comfortable and wish to help others to be so too.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: As I travel around the world, it's often the small business owners that has helped to make it a memorable journey. Time to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph the beauty in life and luckily can make a living doing it.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I would like to help any way I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an international hotel company based out of New York.

lender.name: camille
lender.loan_because: c'est normal

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to live the life I lead and would like to find ways to give back and help others who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I'm married with 2 children and I advise others on the best way to invest their money.

lender.name: Elmira College WMS
lender.loan_because: Our senior seminar in Feminist Studies studied issues faced by women all over the world. We decided to fund raise to give micro-loans to women as part of our celebration of International Women's Day.

lender.name: Saint Bonaventure
lender.loan_because: we are a charitable service organization. We like to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: High school students.

lender.name: Conni, Tell, Jennie & T
lender.loan_because: I believe it's a way to end the cycle of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Conni works in schools helping teachers learn how to teach inquiry based science; Tell is a retired box board salesperson; Jennie is a college student who is interested in web-based social marketing, and T is a high school student who loves basketball.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I want to work as a doctor one day, right now i'm just going to school

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I am Christian and a human.
lender.occupational_info: Helping scientists look at the stars. I work on computer programs to help control 2 telescopes on the top of Mauna Kea in Hawaii.

lender.name: Kristy
lender.loan_because: I like to think that for even a small moment I helped make someone's life better.

lender.name: Celeste
lender.loan_because: I am super blessed and I want to help my human family live better lives through microloans.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: It's a small way to help someone else become an entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: I work with entrepreneurs to help them start their technology businesses.

lender.name: Adair
lender.occupational_info: I help students gain control over their writing and succeed in college when maybe English isn't their native language or maybe writing isn't their strong point.

lender.name: ronan
lender.loan_because: i m rich and it s better than doing war

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Even though I don't have a lot of money myself, it is important to give to others.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I believe in the ability for anyone with the will and a little financial help to create something that will keep on giving to the community and society she or he belongs to.
lender.occupational_info: I create creative products for people and causes I support, such as websites, t-shirts, motion graphics...

lender.name: Janey Bird
lender.loan_because: I hope that by giving I can begin to deserve some of the opportunities I've been given: to go to school, to see new places and to be cared for by others so completely. (Thanks Mom & Dad for my Kiva account!)
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying all forms of performing arts. Hopefully my training will help me someday create work that moves people to action.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I got lucky to be born an American. It's only right to give what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help soldiers prepare themselves for a career after the military.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: someone loaned to me in my country to start my business 10 years ago.I think everyone should have a chance to own their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I go to fairs and special events and own 11 mobile kitchen and prepare many different kinds of food for sale.

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because: it helps people become entrepreneurs who might otherwise not be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I do biomedical research.

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: I can and I know it makes a difference. If my small loan can help to build a business that will support a family then why wouldn't I donate. :)
lender.occupational_info: I provide administrative support to my coworkers and I help keep things organized.

lender.name: Jason
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to young children in New York City. Many of my students come from Latin America and Asia.

lender.name: Drea
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a hand up!
lender.occupational_info: I run a small bookstore.

lender.name: Wolf
lender.loan_because: This is a great idea and we want to help.

lender.name: Vikki
lender.loan_because: I believe in the Chinese proverb... Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers.

lender.name: mespacio
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in there needs bye you help me in sale.
lender.occupational_info: help me with my website to get known so i can lend money and help people

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because:
I want to help anyone i can , I'm actually here, no to get money back but to help those how might not have the Financial abilities as myself. I don't put off on anyone to do anything, I just want to help myself. Once i heard about what Kiva does, I thought it was the greatest opportunity for a average guy to make a difference. If u have any questions or comments or just want to talk, feel free to email me, anytime. I would love to meet people on here and make "SMALL TEAMS". I'm not into making a huge 100 person team, i want it personable. Were everyone in the team is just that a team. If the rich, the powerful, won't change or help the world let us do it.
"Positive education activates consent elevation" - The Grave Diggaz

lender.name: natalie
lender.loan_because: this land is my land, this land is your land.
lender.occupational_info: my job is to learn as much as i can.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: Poverty is unacceptable. I consider myself lucky to have an extra $25 in my wallet and would rather spend it towards helping someone get a head start, than purchase a "thing" that will just sit in my place.
lender.occupational_info: I have a profound interest in political science and sociology. I am a student and still learning how I can make use of my abilities to help alleviate poverty.

lender.name: rueliza
lender.loan_because: i want to start a business which is beauty salon. pls help me to start my business. for me to sustained my daily need especialy my son.
lender.occupational_info: im a single mom i have one son his 9m0nths old only.

lender.name: kccdo
lender.loan_because: we are Serving The Villages in Uganda!
lender.occupational_info:
KASAALA CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT ORGANIZATION May
BACKGROUND: KASAALA CHRISTIAN COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT ORGANIZATION (KCCDO), started way buck in 2007, wit vision of helping all the disadvantaged in the community,with knowledge and skills to lead equality of life.
KCCDO.is a registered organization by Community based organization(CBO),under the registered number CD-030-2009.
VISION: Is to reach out all the community members of the different categories ie orphans, widows, women,youth, single mothers, grandmothers, school-drop-outs,care givers,elderly people and all that living with HIV/AIDS ,poor families,
MAJOR OBJECTIVES: To mobilize all the community members in order to increase their knowledge, equip them with skills for self reliance and to lead qualitative life.
Skills Training Program COMMUNITY VOCATIONAL CENTER, VISION; IS to promote peoples talents &giving them skills for successful in life.
MISSION;
To mobilize all the community members in order to increase their knowledge, equip them with skills for self reliance and to lead qualitative life.
MOTTO;
IN GOD WE TRUST.
COURSES PROVIDED;
-TAILORING COURSES, THIS TAKES 1 YEAR,DIVIDE INTO 3 TERMS,
-KNITTING COURSES,THIS TAKES 1 YEAR,DIVIDE INTO 3 TERMS,
-HAIR DRESSING COURSES,THIS TAKES ONLY 1 YEAR
-SALOON MANAGEMENT,THIS TAKES 1 YEAR
-HAND-CRAFT COURSES,THIS TAKE 1 YEAR
AFTER THE COMPLETION OF THE COURSE WE ARE WARDING A CERTIFICATE, FOR OUR TRAINEES.
TARGETED PEOPLE,
-WIDOWS -WOMEN -YOUTH -SINGLE MOTHERS -SCHOOL-DROP OUTS, -ORPHANS -HIV/AIDS AFFECTED,
YOU CAN JOIN US BY HELPING THIS NEEDY COMMUNITY MEMBERS WHO ARE IN NEED OF THE SKILLS, THROUGH YOUR DONATIONS,OR ANY ,OF THE FOLLOWING
NEEDS,
WE NEED 25 SEWING MACHINES. WE NEED 5KNITTING MACHINES, WE NEED SALOON EQUIPMENTS, WE NEED 25 COMPUTER MACHINES, WE NEED 5 CARPENTRY TOOL- BOXES, WE NEED 2 WELDING MACHINES(GRINDERS)
IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTION OR need to be part orCOMMENT YOU CAN CONTACT US ON . TEL, +256,256,774530836/+256,785699626, EMAIL, kccdo@yahoo.com
LOCATION: (KCCDO) is located on guru road kasaala village luweero sub county luweero district TEL: +256,774530836 EMAIL:kccdo@yahoo.com site,http://kccdo.multiply.com/ CONTACT PERSON: Ibrahim Lubega.

lender.name: Jorge
lender.occupational_info: I research how to help transforming the world to a sustainable place by using computers, mobiles and other information technologies.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: This is a worthwhile cause, for any occasion, why send flowers that die or candy that make one fat! Send a gift of compassion

lender.name: Sergej
lender.loan_because: You can get everything in life you want if you will just help enough other people get what they want.

lender.name: Diya
lender.loan_because: With just a little of my money, I can support someone else with their business and change their life!
lender.occupational_info: I am guiding other people to find their own path, job and vision in their life.

lender.name: Jens
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand sometimes and 21st century Financial Institutions are the wrong place to go for help
lender.occupational_info: haha I cook!!!!

lender.name: Patrik
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in a less privileged country by providing means to people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: To carry through housing projects from planning to construction phase within the municipality of Stockholm.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I believe giving back is the best way to show gratitude for my own opportunities and good fortune in life. Cheezy as it may sound, love is really all that really matters.
lender.occupational_info: I build web sites.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: We are all connected on this rock in the universe. What happens to one of us happens to all of us.
lender.occupational_info: I simply serve my fellow human beings on this planet as an act of worship.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: 1 Timothy 6:17-19

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because:
Several students I work with mentioned Kiva to me in the spring of 2009. I am excited to connect with others around the world and watch business ventures flourish.
http://teamvirginia.wordpress.com/2009/04/08/heather-gets-good-kiva-counsel-from-her-students/
lender.occupational_info:
As of May 2010, I'm in Australia.
As a career counselor, I helped college students discover their career interests and pursue internships, full-time employment, and graduate school plans.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: It helps others that need the help.

lender.name: Marisa
lender.loan_because: for the price of a couple of cups of coffee, I can change someone's life!

lender.name: Lee Willard
lender.loan_because: It helps improve the world
lender.occupational_info: Fun

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I can afford to, and because I believe in Kiva.org's mission. What's pennies a day to me can change the life of someone, and if they have a business plan, and make good on repayment, we're both satisfied. I like to make loans to folks who do the same kinds of things I like to do: sewing, crafting, cooking & baking!

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people the opportunity to create their own success.
lender.occupational_info: I write children's books, web and magazine articles, and I also write in my blog.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I like to support people with great ideas and dreams. And I love the idea of micro-financing. It gives me the possibility to lend money to motivated people I have never met, but in which I believe.
lender.occupational_info: Nerdy and Nifty. Building things.

lender.name: QMTA
lender.loan_because: small moves, doing the right things at the right pace, will make this world a better place!

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: Given the current criminals and incompetence running the banking sector, you'd be crazy not to micro lend!

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to give back to people in need of support. Makes me feel I am doing my share to help the poor.
lender.occupational_info: I was a business owner for over 30 years and can appreciate how much effort it takes to start and stay in business. I now work part time at a health food store. My partner Frank works for Environment Canada.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: Les nouvelles technologies permettent aujourd'hui d'effectuer des prêts et de contribuer au micro-crédits dans les pays en voie de développement.
lender.occupational_info: Directeur de services éducatifs et blogueur professionnel.

lender.name: steven
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to able to do so
lender.occupational_info: I design computer systems to help people selllng and manufacturing

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I like to learn about people's lives all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pilot for a regional airline flying 50-seat airplanes.

lender.name: Scott and Lindsey
lender.loan_because: "You cannot hope to build a better world without improving the individuals. To that end, each of us must work for our own improvement and, at the same time, share a general responsibility for all humanity, our particular duty being to aid those to whom we think we can be most useful." -Marie Curie
lender.occupational_info: Scott flies fast jet aircraft and Lindsey helps children with Autism.

lender.name: Nasima
lender.loan_because: Of the Recession!

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a helping hand - we can all make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I work in marketing, specifically for companies that do good positive and healthy work.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to help people
lender.occupational_info: I am a student nurse. I am trying to start my own organization donating medicine to Sudan and volunteering in a medical clinic.

lender.name: Steve and Liz
lender.loan_because: as Americans, we have privileges not always available to others. We feel a responsibility to share resources.
lender.occupational_info: We are professional educators who take advantage of our summers off to see the world. We've seen hard working people in many countries and know our Kiva loans will make a difference.

lender.name: Hope
lender.loan_because: I want to help others make a living.
lender.occupational_info: I manage conferences and events for an educational content provider

lender.name: Oscar
lender.loan_because: All we need
lender.occupational_info: Share the learning with people

lender.name: Koushik
lender.loan_because: We (Archana and I) like to be fulfill someone's dream of self-sufficiency.
lender.occupational_info: Sales professional and a Graduate student

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Every person needs a chance to receive so that we can then pass on these gifts to others who can then be blessed and pass on these gifts to enrich the lives of others. The international community heals and becomes sustainable and vibrant when we continue circulating these gifts and blessings from hand to hand in love and good will.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy teaching English overseas because I learn so much from people in every culture. There is so much wisdom and kindness in this world. A little bit of God lives in each and every living being around this beautiful planet. Strangers are simply friends we have not met yet. I want to spend my life meeting and getting to know these new friends.

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student studying the archaeology of the state of Wisconsin.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: it helps people out..
lender.occupational_info: student

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: We are all one family.

lender.name: Paul and Juliet
lender.loan_because: We thought it was such a wonderful idea, and doing it in memory of Millie and Pepper.

lender.name: Seder 2009 Team
lender.loan_because: We want to help people to have more freedom in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We celebrate holidays together and help each other in lots of ways.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: microfinancing works!
lender.occupational_info: I study linguistics, which means that I am interested in studying the varieties of language across the world.

lender.name: Edith & Carmine
lender.loan_because: We believe that too many people are suffering needlessly because of the political, economic, and cultural mindset that there is not enough (of anything) to go around. This is utter nonsense. What is needed is to level the financial playing field because everyone in the world has a right to live well and with dignity.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
"A generous man will prosper; he who refreshes others will himself be refreshed."
Proverbs 11:25 NIV

lender.name: pat
lender.loan_because: It is such a direct way of sharing.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer at a school teaching english to refugees who have come to New Zealand.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way for entrepeneurs in other countries to receive the assistance they need. These loans change lives and to me that is more important than spending $25 on more clothes or purses that I really do not need more of.
lender.occupational_info: Officially, they call my position a Library Page. But I work in Public Library performing Human Resources related tasks. I perform clerical work: answering phones, inputing data, photocopying, administrative support etc.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I love.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: It leaves the recipients with their dignity intact and is a solution rather than a temporary fix like charity.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a factory and I troubleshoot equipment.
